::Galaxor::

Galaxor stumbles back from the assault of laser shots that Abominus
had given him earlier, his chest badly dented. He sees Abominus turn
and takes his chance, silently jumping forward and slashing his sword
at a downward angle to attempt to cut into Abominus's neck with all
his might.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: hey hey, Jen slow down here! I didn't get time to respond to 
> the first two missiles, so we'll just ingore the second two. =)
> Also, why do you almost always post that your attacks should hit?
> 
> Soulstice, who was next at controlling Abz of steel again? =)
> 
> ---Abominus---
> 
> Abominus stands up straight, and several missiles slam into his 
> upper back. "Ba.. bac... Abominus.... destroy...." He turns around 
> to face Element(G). Numerous large laser beams are emitted from 
> his lower chest, and his twin shoulder mounted rapid concussion 
> cannons, begin firing in bursts of eight, all targeted at Element(G).
